page.title: 16SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Social concerns Blackhead There is some controversy with the Parish Council about the "footpath" passing the Headland Hotel. There is no actual poverty. One old age pensioner says he has never been so well off in his life. The recent milk quotas imposed on farmers by the European Community have made dairy farmers rethink their methods,using less artificial fertiliser and bought in food to reduce their costs. Many people are raising money to help the drought victims in Africa. There is a Green Peace supporter who deplores the current French nuclear testing in the Pacific. There is a driver for Age Concern,a member of the St.Keverne Parish Council and Village Hall Committee.
